speaking_engagements.title: Scaling GraphQL Federation in the Enterprise
speaking_engagements.description: Presented strategies for implementing and scaling GraphQL Federation across large enterprise organizations. Covered architectural patterns, governance models, developer enablement, and lessons learned from deploying federation at Fidelity Investments. The talk included real-world examples of challenges faced and solutions implemented to achieve enterprise-wide GraphQL adoption.
key_takeaways: Federation requires both technical infrastructure and organizational support
Developer education is critical for successful adoption
Start with pilot teams and expand incrementally
Governance should enable, not restrict, innovation

speaking_engagements.title: Building Developer Communities Around GraphQL
speaking_engagements.description: Shared insights on creating and nurturing internal developer communities to accelerate GraphQL adoption. Discussed the creation of the GraphQL Certification Program, organizing internal conferences, and building sustainable community engagement models. Highlighted metrics showing how community investment directly correlates with technology adoption rates.
key_takeaways: Certification programs provide motivation and validate skills
Regular events maintain momentum and engagement
Community office hours address adoption barriers quickly
Measure community health through engagement metrics, not just adoption numbers

speaking_engagements.title: From Developer to Director: Navigating a Career in Architecture
speaking_engagements.description: Shared personal career journey from freelance web developer to Director of Architecture at a Fortune 500 company. Discussed navigating career transitions, building technical leadership skills, overcoming challenges as a woman in technology, and strategies for continuous learning and growth. Emphasized the importance of mentorship, community, and staying technically hands-on as you advance in leadership.
key_takeaways: Technical depth enables better architectural decisions
Leadership is about enabling others, not just making decisions
Continuous learning is essential at every career stage
Advocate for yourself and others

speaking_engagements.title: GraphQL at Scale: Performance and Optimization Strategies
speaking_engagements.description: Deep technical dive into performance optimization strategies for GraphQL at enterprise scale. Covered query optimization, caching strategies, monitoring and observability, and handling high-traffic scenarios. Shared specific techniques used at Fidelity to maintain sub-200ms response times while handling millions of requests daily.
key_takeaways: DataLoader is essential for preventing N+1 query problems
Implement query complexity analysis to prevent abuse
Caching strategy should consider both edge and origin caching
Monitor query patterns to identify optimization opportunities

speaking_engagements.title: Launching GraphQL Day - Internal Conference
speaking_engagements.description: Organized and keynoted the inaugural internal GraphQL Day Conference at Fidelity Investments. The event featured talks from internal teams, workshops, and networking opportunities. Attendance exceeded expectations with 200+ developers participating. The conference established GraphQL as a strategic technology choice and created lasting community connections.
key_takeaways: Internal conferences accelerate technology adoption
Showcasing internal success stories builds confidence
Hands-on workshops are more valuable than presentations alone
Community connections formed at events drive ongoing collaboration

speaking_engagements.title: GraphQL Day 2023: Advanced Patterns and Best Practices
speaking_engagements.description: Keynoted the second annual GraphQL Day Conference, focusing on advanced patterns and sharing lessons learned from a year of expanded GraphQL usage. Presented case studies from teams that had adopted GraphQL, discussed evolving best practices, and facilitated discussions on the future direction of GraphQL at Fidelity.
key_takeaways: Year-over-year growth demonstrated successful adoption strategy
Advanced patterns enable more sophisticated use cases
Continuous evolution of standards keeps pace with technology changes
Community-driven standards gain better adoption than top-down mandates
